name: Senpai Screams
description:
Controls for Windows/Web:

  • Movement - Arrow keys or WASD
  • Open the menu during gameplay (and get the mouse pointer) - Escape

Time to die, Onii-chan!

You're trapped in a maze with no way out. You're trapped in a maze... with anime.

Can you avoid all the girls and escape?

A brand new comedy-horror spooks its way to Windows in 2017!

(Senpai Screams is one of my silly smaller games, so please don't go in expecting something grand, ok?)

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 31/05/2017
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/SenpaiScreams/
  • You can follow me on twitter, if you're into that: http://twitter.com/CaptDreamcast

Thanks for playing!
